definition: a certain number or amount/how many?/how much?
relevant/to have to do with/coherent (Physics: light etc)
to be irrelevant/to have nothing to do with
to go to war (idiom)/to make a big fuss over sth

pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: Cognac/brandy 白蘭地|白兰地[bai2 lan2 di4] from the Cognac region of southwest France
lit. to exchange weapons of war for gifts of jade and silk (idiom)/fig. to turn hostility into friendship
pinyin: hua4 gan1 ge1 wei2 yu4 bo2

definition: the 10 heavenly stems 甲[jia3], 乙[yi3], 丙[bing3], 丁[ding1], 戊[wu4], 己[ji3], 庚[geng1], 辛[xin1], 壬[ren2], 癸[gui3], used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal numbers I, II etc

sentences.english: Imes knows his business because he has been in this line for years.
sentences.chinese: 因爲艾姆斯干這行多年，所以他精通業務。

sentences.english: Ganqi performance in Xingtian myth contained witchery and religious factors.
sentences.chinese: 積澱在刑天神話中的干鏚之舞，蘊含巫術宗教因素。

sentences.english: If, in this Heavenly Stems of the farm, they are taboo.
sentences.chinese: 若在這天干了農活，就屬於犯忌句號。

sentences.english: The kids do not know what to do with themselves on rainy days.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們不知道雨天干什麼好。

sentences.english: Great heat can ignite almost any dry matter.
sentences.chinese: 酷暑幾乎能點燃任何干物質。

sentences.english: Yesterday I did the labor work the whole day and had a sound sleep in the night.
sentences.chinese: 昨天干了一整天的體力活，夜裏睡得很沉。

sentences.english: Those efforts offer a model for regulation of stem-cell therapies.
sentences.chinese: 這些努力爲今天干細胞療法的準則提供了範本。

sentences.english: What do you do on Monday?
Cabot said it was Russian. How did it get in there?
sentences.chinese: 卡伯特說是俄羅斯干的這東西怎麼進來的？

sentences.english: He was closeted there for hours at a time.
sentences.chinese: 他在那裏閉門不出，一干就是幾個小時。

sentences.english: You will find it uneasy when you do it yourself.
sentences.chinese: 你自己干時會覺得不容易了。

sentences.english: Take a day off. That's what I'm doing today. Don't tell my boss.
sentences.chinese: 放一天假這正是我本日干的，別見告我的老闆。

sentences.english: It was you who opened up springs and streams; you dried up the ever flowing rivers.
sentences.chinese: 你曾分裂磐石，水便成了溪河，你使長流的江河干了。

sentences.english: The centre of the city is spotlessly [stainlessly] clean.
sentences.chinese: 市中心一塵不染干乾淨淨。

sentences.english: What do you often do on Sunday? I often water the flowers and listen to music.
sentences.chinese: 你經常在星期天干什麼？我通常澆花和聽音樂。

sentences.english: Smith is a good man for the job, but I'm not so sure about Robinson.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯干這工作很合適，但對羅賓遜我無把握。

definition: erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]
erhua variant of 苦活[ku3 huo2]
to cook on a slow fire/to extract by heating/to decoct/to endure
to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
to struggle to get free/to strive to acquire/to make (money)
